description: This file contains functions and components to generate a DOCX document with a focus on creating an 'Actions' table based on provided schema and data, as well as utility functions for text formatting and label normalization. It includes methods for building document structure, styling, and generating filenames.

methods.name: normalizeLabel(label)
methods.description: Converts a label into a normalized, key-like identifier by lowercasing and replacing special characters.

methods.name: cleanValue(v)
methods.description: Removes placeholder underscores and trims artifacts from display values.

methods.name: toProfessionalLabel(keyOrLabel)
methods.description: Converts schema keys into human-readable, professional labels, like 'Client Portfolio'.

methods.name: formatValue(v)
methods.description: Formats various types of values (arrays, objects, primitives) for display in the document.

methods.name: buildOrderedActionFields(templateSchema = {}, templateData = {})
methods.description: Builds an ordered, deduplicated list of schema fields for the Actions table, respecting schema order and labels.

methods.name: getByPath(obj, path, fallback = "")
methods.description: Retrieves a nested value from an object given a dotted path string.

methods.name: buildActionsTable({ templateSchema, templateData })
methods.description: Constructs an 'Actions' table with labeled, deduplicated, and formatted data for inclusion in the DOCX document.

methods.name: buildHeader()
methods.description: Creates a minimal header for the document.

methods.name: buildFooter()
methods.description: Creates a minimal footer for the document.

methods.name: buildSowDocx(data, templateSchema)
methods.description: Main exported function to generate a DOCX blob document containing the 'Actions' table from data and schema.

methods.name: makeSowDocxFilename(data)
methods.description: Generates a filename for the DOCX document based on provided metadata.

methods.name: makeCell( children, { widthPct, vAlign = VerticalAlign.TOP, padding = 200, opts = {} } = {} )
para( text, { bold = false, size = 21, align = AlignmentType.LEFT, after = 80 } = {} )
